item.name: misc
item.description:
In this folder you will find the rest enpoints which allow you to:
 - obtain your API token
 - list all the customer you created
 - delete them one by one to prevent you from having duplicate entries

item.name: Screening Scenario 1
item.description:
Perform KYC Screening on a customer resulting in a perfect match:
 - Create an Individual customer
 - View Risk Profile
 - Run Screening with scope Watchlist + PEP
 - View Matches including scorecard
 - View Risk Profile
 - Bulk Confirm
 - View Risk Profile

item.name: s1.04 View screening matches and scorecard

request.description: We confirmed a match in the previous call which mean we can dismiss the others

item.name: Screening Scenario 2
item.description:
Perform KYC Screening on a customer resulting in a high score match:
 - Create an Individual customer
 - View Risk Profile
 - Run Screening with scope Watchlist + PEP
 - View Matches including scorecard
 - View Risk Profile
 - Bulk Confirm
 - View Risk Profile

item.name: s2.04 View screening matches and scorecard

request.description: We confirmed a match in the previous call which mean we can dismiss the others

item.name: Screening Scenario 3
item.description:
Perform KYC Screening on a customer resulting in a high score but lower match than in scenario 2:
 - Create an Individual customer
 - View Risk Profile
 - Run Screening with scope Watchlist + PEP
 - View Matches including scorecard
 - View Risk Profile
 - Bulk Confirm
 - View Risk Profile

item.name: s3.04 View screening matches and scorecard

request.description: We confirmed a match in the previous call which mean we can dismiss the others

item.name: Screening Scenario 4
item.description:
Perform KYC Screening on a customer resulting in a low but above threshold score match:
 - Create an Individual customer
 - View Risk Profile
 - Run Screening with scope Watchlist + PEP
 - View Matches including scorecard
 - View Risk Profile
 - Bulk Confirm
 - View Risk Profile

item.name: s4.04 View screening matches and scorecard

request.description: We confirmed a match in the previous call which mean we can dismiss the others

item.name: ID Verification
item.description: In this folder you will see how to verify someone's document

request.description: Testing the data retreived from the document attach to a customer.
Testing the data retreived from the document attach to a customer.
